          throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        initialize the servlet.
        • http.param OP_TYPE = OP_SEARCH,
        • http.param OP_SCOPE - the scope of the request operation:
          • "impl" ACL implementations
          • "acls" ACL rules
          • "evaluatorTypes" ACL evaluators.
